verses.verse: <S%G2532>And<s%> Jesus <S%G1525>entered<s%> and passed <S%G1330>through<s%> <S%G2410>Jericho<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%>, <S%G2400>behold<s%>, there was a <S%G435>man<s%> <S%G3686>named<s%> <S%G2564><s%> <S%G2195>Zacchaeus<s%>, <S%G2532>which<s%> <S%G846><s%> <S%G2258>was<s%> the chief among the <S%G754>publicans<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3778>he<s%> <S%G2258>was<s%> <S%G4145>rich<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%> he <S%G2212>sought<s%> to <S%G1492>see<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5101>who<s%> he <S%G2076>was<s%>; <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1410>could<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G575>for<s%> the <S%G3793>press<s%>, <S%G3754>because<s%> he <S%G2258>was<s%> <S%G3398>little<s%> of <S%G2244>stature<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%> he <S%G4390>ran<s%> <S%G1715>before<s%>, and climbed <S%G305>up<s%> <S%G1909>into<s%> a sycomore <S%G4809>tree<s%> <S%G2443>to<s%> <S%G1492>see<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>: <S%G3754>for<s%> he <S%G3195>was<s%> to <S%G1330>pass<s%> <S%G1223><s%> <S%G1565>that<s%> way.

<S%G2532>And<s%> <S%G5613>when<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G2064>came<s%> <S%G1909>to<s%> the <S%G5117>place<s%>, he looked <S%G308>up<s%>, and <S%G1492>saw<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2036>said<s%> <S%G4314>unto<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>, <S%G2195>Zacchaeus<s%>, make <S%G4692>haste<s%>, and come <S%G2597>down<s%>; <S%G1063>for<s%> to <S%G4594>day<s%> <S%G3165>I<s%> <S%G1163>must<s%> <S%G3306>abide<s%> <S%G1722>at<s%> <S%G4675>thy<s%> <S%G3624>house<s%>.
<S%G2532>And<s%> he made <S%G4692>haste<s%>, and came <S%G2597>down<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G5264>received<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G5463>joyfully<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%> when they <S%G1492>saw<s%> it, <S%G1234>they<s%> <S%G537>all<s%> <S%G1234>murmured<s%>, <S%G3004>saying<s%>, <S%G3754>That<s%> he was <S%G1525>gone<s%> to be <S%G2647>guest<s%> <S%G3844>with<s%> a <S%G435>man<s%> that is a <S%G268>sinner<s%>.

<S%G1161>And<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G2036>said<s%> <S%G4314>unto<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>, <S%G3754><s%> This <S%G4594>day<s%> <S%G1096>is<s%> <S%G4991>salvation<s%> <S%G1096>come<s%> to <S%G5129>this<s%> <S%G3624>house<s%>, forsomuch <S%G2530>as<s%> <S%G846>he<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> a <S%G5207>son<s%> of <S%G11>Abraham<s%>.

<S%G1161>And<s%> as <S%G846>they<s%> <S%G191>heard<s%> these <S%G5023>things<s%>, he <S%G4369>added<s%> and <S%G2036>spake<s%> a <S%G3850>parable<s%>, <S%G1223>because<s%> <S%G846>he<s%> <S%G1511>was<s%> <S%G1451>nigh<s%> to <S%G2419>Jerusalem<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> because <S%G846>they<s%> <S%G1380>thought<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> the <S%G932>kingdom<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G3195>should<s%> <S%G3916>immediately<s%> <S%G398>appear<s%>.

<S%G1161>But<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G4177>citizens<s%> <S%G3404>hated<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G649>sent<s%> a <S%G4242>message<s%> <S%G3694>after<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>, <S%G3004>saying<s%>, We <S%G2309>will<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G2309>have<s%> <S%G5126>this<s%> man to <S%G936>reign<s%> <S%G1909>over<s%> <S%G2248>us<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%> it came to <S%G1096>pass<s%>, that <S%G1722>when<s%> <S%G846>he<s%> was <S%G1880>returned<s%>, having <S%G2983>received<s%> the <S%G932>kingdom<s%>, <S%G2532>then<s%> he <S%G2036>commanded<s%> <S%G5128>these<s%> <S%G1401>servants<s%> to be <S%G5455>called<s%> unto <S%G846>him<s%>, to <S%G3739>whom<s%> he had <S%G1325>given<s%> the <S%G694>money<s%>, <S%G2443>that<s%> he might <S%G1097>know<s%> how <S%G5101>much<s%> every <S%G5101>man<s%> had gained by <S%G1281>trading<s%>.
<S%G1161>Then<s%> <S%G3854>came<s%> the <S%G4413>first<s%>, <S%G3004>saying<s%>, <S%G2962>Lord<s%>, <S%G4675>thy<s%> <S%G3414>pound<s%> hath <S%G4333>gained<s%> <S%G1176>ten<s%> <S%G3414>pounds<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%> he <S%G2036>said<s%> unto <S%G846>him<s%>, <S%G2095>Well<s%>, thou <S%G18>good<s%> <S%G1401>servant<s%>: <S%G3754>because<s%> thou hast <S%G1096>been<s%> <S%G4103>faithful<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> a very <S%G1646>little<s%>, <S%G2192>have<s%> thou <S%G2468>authority<s%> <S%G1849><s%> <S%G1883>over<s%> <S%G1176>ten<s%> <S%G4172>cities<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%> he <S%G2036>said<s%> unto them that stood <S%G3936>by<s%>, <S%G142>Take<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> the <S%G3414>pound<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1325>give<s%> it to him that <S%G2192>hath<s%> <S%G1176>ten<s%> <S%G3414>pounds<s%>.
<S%G2532>(And<s%> they <S%G2036>said<s%> unto <S%G846>him<s%>, <S%G2962>Lord<s%>, he <S%G2192>hath<s%> <S%G1176>ten<s%> <S%G3414>pounds<s%>.)

<S%G1063>For<s%> I <S%G3004>say<s%> unto <S%G5213>you<s%>, <S%G3754>That<s%> unto every <S%G3956>one<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> <S%G2192>hath<s%> shall be <S%G1325>given<s%>; <S%G1161>and<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> him that <S%G2192>hath<s%> <S%G3361>not<s%>, <S%G2532>even<s%> <S%G3739>that<s%> he <S%G2192>hath<s%> shall be taken <S%G142>away<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>.

<S%G4133>But<s%> <S%G1565>those<s%> <S%G3450>mine<s%> <S%G2190>enemies<s%>, <S%G3588>which<s%> <S%G2309>would<s%> <S%G3361>not<s%> that <S%G3165>I<s%> should <S%G936>reign<s%> <S%G1909>over<s%> <S%G846>them<s%>, <S%G71>bring<s%> <S%G5602>hither<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2695>slay<s%> them <S%G1715>before<s%> <S%G3450>me<s%>.
<S%G2532>And<s%> when he had <S%G5023>thus<s%> <S%G2036>spoken<s%>, he <S%G4198>went<s%> <S%G1715>before<s%>, ascending <S%G305>up<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G2414>Jerusalem<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%> it came to <S%G1096>pass<s%>, <S%G5613>when<s%> he was come <S%G1448>nigh<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G967>Bethphage<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G963>Bethany<s%>, <S%G4314>at<s%> the <S%G3735>mount<s%> <S%G2564>called<s%> the mount of <S%G1636>Olives<s%>, he <S%G649>sent<s%> <S%G1417>two<s%> of <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G3101>disciples<s%>,

<S%G2036>Saying<s%>, Go <S%G5217>ye<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G2968>village<s%> over <S%G2713>against<s%> you; <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G3739>which<s%> at your <S%G1531>entering<s%> ye shall <S%G2147>find<s%> a <S%G4454>colt<s%> <S%G1210>tied<s%>, <S%G1909>whereon<s%> <S%G3739><s%> yet <S%G3762>never<s%> <S%G444>man<s%> <S%G2523>sat<s%> <S%G4455><s%>: <S%G3089>loose<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>, and <S%G71>bring<s%> him hither.

<S%G2532>And<s%> <S%G1437>if<s%> any <S%G5100>man<s%> <S%G2065>ask<s%> <S%G5209>you<s%>, <S%G1302>Why<s%> do ye <S%G3089>loose<s%> him? <S%G3779>thus<s%> shall ye <S%G2046>say<s%> unto <S%G846>him<s%>, <S%G3754>Because<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2192>hath<s%> <S%G5532>need<s%> of <S%G846>him<s%>.
<S%G1161>And<s%> they that were <S%G649>sent<s%> went their <S%G565>way<s%>, and <S%G2147>found<s%> even <S%G2531>as<s%> he had <S%G2036>said<s%> unto <S%G846>them<s%>.

<S%G1161>And<s%> as <S%G846>they<s%> were <S%G3089>loosing<s%> the <S%G4454>colt<s%>, the <S%G2962>owners<s%> <S%G846>thereof<s%> <S%G2036>said<s%> <S%G4314>unto<s%> <S%G846>them<s%>, <S%G5101>Why<s%> loose <S%G3089>ye<s%> the <S%G4454>colt<s%>?
<S%G1161>And<s%> they <S%G2036>said<s%>, The <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2192>hath<s%> <S%G5532>need<s%> of <S%G846>him<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%> they <S%G71>brought<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G4314>to<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%>: <S%G2532>and<s%> they <S%G1977>cast<s%> <S%G1438>their<s%> <S%G2440>garments<s%> <S%G1909>upon<s%> <S%G1977><s%> the <S%G4454>colt<s%>, <S%G1977>and<s%> they <S%G1913>set<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G1913>thereon<s%>.

And when <S%G846>he<s%> was come <S%G1448>nigh<s%>, <S%G1161>even<s%> <S%G2235>now<s%> <S%G4314>at<s%> the <S%G2600>descent<s%> of the <S%G3735>mount<s%> of <S%G1636>Olives<s%>, the <S%G537>whole<s%> <S%G4128>multitude<s%> of the <S%G3101>disciples<s%> <S%G756>began<s%> to <S%G5463>rejoice<s%> and <S%G134>praise<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> with a <S%G3173>loud<s%> <S%G5456>voice<s%> <S%G4012>for<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> the mighty <S%G1411>works<s%> <S%G3739>that<s%> they had <S%G1492>seen<s%>;

<S%G3004>Saying<s%>, <S%G2127>Blessed<s%> be the <S%G935>King<s%> that <S%G2064>cometh<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G3686>name<s%> of the <S%G2962>Lord<s%>: <S%G1515>peace<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G3772>heaven<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1391>glory<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G5310>highest<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%> <S%G5100>some<s%> of the <S%G5330>Pharisees<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> among the <S%G3793>multitude<s%> <S%G2036>said<s%> <S%G4314>unto<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>, <S%G1320>Master<s%>, <S%G2008>rebuke<s%> <S%G4675>thy<s%> <S%G3101>disciples<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%> he <S%G611>answered<s%> and <S%G2036>said<s%> unto <S%G846>them<s%>, I <S%G3004>tell<s%> <S%G5213>you<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%>, <S%G1437>if<s%> <S%G3778>these<s%> should hold their <S%G4623>peace<s%>, the <S%G3037>stones<s%> would immediately cry <S%G2896>out<s%>.
<S%G2532>And<s%> <S%G5613>when<s%> he was come <S%G1448>near<s%>, he <S%G1492>beheld<s%> the <S%G4172>city<s%>, and <S%G2799>wept<s%> <S%G1909>over<s%> <S%G846>it<s%>,
